locations.description: Title block with version, date, and authorship for the HOA Management System extension plan.
Goal, high-level requirements, and key assumptions summarizing the roadmap scope.
Architectural style, tech stack, key components, data model, API strategy, and communication patterns.
List of planned diagrams, specs, and their intended iterations/formats.
Proposed repository layout covering backend, frontend, docs, scripts, and workflow folders.
Section 4 directives outlining constraints, testing expectations, and documentation discipline.
Iteration plan summary including total iterations and dependency map.
Iteration 1 goal, tasks, and governance for board foundations.
Task I1.T1: Board + config migrations and seeds.
Task I1.T2: Component diagram creation.
Task I1.T3: Mermaid ERD documentation.
Task I1.T4: Backend board endpoints, SendGrid contact flow, and tests.
Task I1.T5: Update OpenAPI + changelog for board features.
Iteration 2 goal, tasks, and guardrails for the Accessibility Suite.
Task I2.T1: AccessibilityContext implementation and tests.
Task I2.T2: Accessibility theme token specification (Markdown + JSON).
Task I2.T3: createAppTheme refactor and ThemeProvider wiring.
Task I2.T4: Accessibility toggle component + nav integration.
Task I2.T5: FormHelper molecule and board/admin form retrofits.
Task I2.T6: Board page integration with new APIs and accessibility cues.
Iteration 3 goal, tasks, and governance for the Democracy module.
Task I3.T1: Poll/Vote migration + seed creation.
Task I3.T2: Backend democracy services, controllers, and hash helper.
Task I3.T3: Democracy hash-chain sequence diagram (PlantUML).
Task I3.T4: Polls + PollDetail frontend pages, receipt UI, and tests.
Task I3.T5: OpenAPI updates for poll/vote endpoints with changelog entries.
Task I3.T6: Email notification + ResidentNotificationLog enhancements for polls.
Iteration 4 goal, tasks, and controls for the Vendor Directory and communications upgrades.
Task I4.T1: Vendor migration, seeds, and moderation flowchart.
Task I4.T2: Vendor backend service, controller, and OpenAPI updates.
Task I4.T3: Resident-facing vendor page with filters and submissions.
Task I4.T4: Admin vendor management UI, metrics, and runbook.
Task I4.T5: Vendor-related email notifications + ResidentNotificationLog entries.
Task I4.T6: Integrated QA, release checklist, and changelog updates for vendor launch.
Iteration 5 goal, tasks, and readiness criteria for CI/CD and launch prep.
Task I5.T1: CI workflow updates with npm audit + expanded tests.
Task I5.T2: Deploy workflow health gate + CI/CD Mermaid diagram.
Task I5.T3: Healthcheck scripts, controller updates, and runbook instructions.
Task I5.T4: End-to-end verification suite + report generation.
Task I5.T5: Documentation refresh and knowledge-transfer checklist.
Task I5.T6: Feature flag rollout scripts, KPI dashboard, and Go/No-Go checklist.
Section 6 covering testing layers, CI/CD expectations, quality gates, artifact validation, and release checklist.
Section 7 glossary defining roadmap-specific terminology and artifacts.
